name: Idolzzz
description:
As an archaeologist you will need to collect around the world ancient idols and pack them in boxes for further transportation to the museum. In this physical and at first glance a simple puzzle game you will have a difficult time getting another copy of deity and trying not to damage it in the process. Collect them all!

Features:
  • real physics
  • idols
  • juicy graphics
  • a lot of idols
  • 3 worlds with levels of increasing complexity
  • lots and lots of idols
  • a variety of mechanisms and devices
